translation.en: Fuck.
-Hi. -[Ruth] Liv, where are you?
-I just got your email. -[Liv] I'm fine.
translation.fr: - J'ai reçu ton e-mail. - Ça va.

translation.en: I just have to go out of town for a couple of days.
[Ruth] Out of town? Is everything--
Everything's in the email I sent. I know it's a lot.
translation.fr: Tout est dans l'e-mail. Je sais, ça fait beaucoup.

translation.en: I just don't want any surprises. I'll try to check in when I can.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas de surprises. J'appelle dès que possible.

translation.en: I just don't know what service is gonna be like.
[Ruth] Sure. Should I loop Danny in?
This is Danny.
He just came over with the merger.
translation.fr: Il nous rejoint suite à la fusion.

translation.en: Hi.
Um… nice to meet you.
Yeah. Why… why wouldn't you?
[Ruth] He's just asking if you still want him on this.
translation.fr: Il demande si tu veux toujours qu'il s'en occupe.

translation.en: He's a great lawyer, of course, I do.
translation.fr: C'est un excellent avocat, bien sûr.

translation.en: Anyway, it's not my call.
translation.fr: De toute façon, ce n'est pas à moi de décider.

translation.en: -[Ruth] Liv, are you sure you're okay? -I'm fine.
translation.fr: - Liv, tu es sûre que ça va ? - Je vais bien.

translation.en: Let's circle back on prep strategy once I'm back in the office.
translation.fr: On parlera stratégie à mon retour au bureau.

translation.en: I've just never known you to take time off--
translation.fr: Tu n'as jamais pris de congés…

translation.en: Ruth, I'm fine. I really have to go. Um,
translation.fr: Ruth, je vais bien. Je dois y aller.

translation.en: -text me if you need anything, okay? Bye. -[Ruth] Liv…
translation.fr: - Envoie un texto si besoin. Salut. - Liv…

translation.en: -[staff] Olivia Rivera? -[Liv] Yeah.
[staff] You're the 1:10 trip to Inuvik, right?
translation.fr: Sur le vol de 13h10 pour Inuvik ?

translation.en: Yes. My plane was supposed to leave like an hour ago?
translation.fr: Oui. Mon avion devait décoller il y a une heure.

translation.en: Yeah, sorry about that.
It looks like wind's pretty bad up in Outer Rapids today.
translation.fr: Le vent fait des siennes dans la région.

translation.en: Your plane's stuck there, so, you're kind of SOL, unfortunately.
translation.fr: Votre avion est coincé là-bas, vous n'avez vraiment pas de bol.

translation.en: We can try to get you on something tomorrow maybe?
translation.fr: Un vol demain, ça vous va ?

translation.en: What? No! No, no, no. I-- I took two flights to get here from New York.
translation.fr: Quoi ? Non, j'ai pris deux vols pour venir de New York.

translation.en: I have to get to Inuvik today.
translation.fr: Je dois être à Inuvik aujourd'hui.

translation.en: I'm… I'm trying to meet someone before they leave again.
translation.fr: Je dois voir quelqu'un avant qu'elle reparte.

translation.en: -Maybe you can call them? -[Liv] No, I…
She… she doesn't know I'm coming.
translation.fr: Elle ne sait pas que je viens.

translation.en: Maybe you should tell her.
Can you get me on a plane or not?
translation.fr: Vous avez un avion pour moi, oui ou non ?

translation.en: I'm sorry, miss, but I can't help you today.
translation.fr: Désolée, mademoiselle, mais je ne peux rien faire pour vous.

translation.en: [exhales] You look just like me when I was your age.
translation.fr: Tu me ressembles quand j'avais ton âge.

translation.en: [in Spanish] I'm able to know that.
[George in English] Where are we going this time?
[Sam] Top of the Mackenzie River.
translation.fr: À la source de la rivière MacKenzie.

translation.en: [George] Jesus. That's past Inuvik.
translation.fr: Bon sang. C'est plus loin qu'Inuvik.

translation.en: Where are they gonna send us next, the North Pole?
translation.fr: Où comptent-ils nous envoyer ensuite, au pôle Nord ?

translation.en: -Excuse me. -[PA system beeps] -Sorry. Excuse me? -[voice over PA] Flight 899…
Excuse me! Sorry. Hi.
Did you say you're going to Inuvik?
Uh… past Inuvik, yeah.
This is gonna sound crazy,
but, is there any way you guys could take me with you?
translation.fr: mais vous pourriez m'emmener avec vous ?

translation.en: Crazy for who? You don't even know us.
translation.fr: Dingue pour qui ? Vous ne nous connaissez pas.

translation.en: Look, I'm small, I have this one bag. I promise I'll be quiet.
translation.fr: Je suis petite, j'ai ce sac. Je promets de ne pas faire de bruit.

translation.en: Quiet's not really an option on a Cessna 208.
translation.fr: C'est le cadet de nos soucis sur un Cessna 208.

translation.en: I just, I really need to get to Inuvik today.
translation.fr: Je dois vraiment aller à Inuvik aujourd'hui.

translation.en: And it looks like my plane is stuck somewhere and--
-I'm sorry, we'd love to help you out. -[Liv] Then help me out.
translation.fr: - Désolé, on adorerait vous aider. - Alors aidez-moi.

translation.en: -Please. -If it was just me?
translation.fr: - S'il vous plaît. - S'il n'y avait que moi…

translation.en: You know, but we're doing this for work.
translation.fr: Mais on fait ça pour le travail.

translation.en: Somebody else is picking up the tab and then if something happens,
translation.fr: Quelqu'un nous paie et s'il arrive quelque chose,

translation.en: I think they may be liable for--
No, they wouldn't. That's not…
I'm a lawyer. That's not a thing.
I'm sorry. Good luck.
I'll give you a thousand dollars.
Each. I'll give you each a thousand dollars.
translation.fr: À chacun. Je vous donne 1 000 dollars chacun.

translation.en: Look, you guys do Venmo? I can-- I can send it to you right now.
translation.fr: Je peux vous transférer ça tout de suite.

translation.en: Look, I feel for you. We just can't do it.
translation.fr: Je compatis. Mais on ne peut pas le faire.

translation.en: I just want to sit on your plane.
translation.fr: Je veux juste monter dans votre avion.

translation.en: I just want to sit on your plane
and travel in the direction that you're already flying.
translation.fr: dans votre avion et aller là où vous allez.

translation.en: -That's it. I just-- -Okay! Okay.
-[security] Everything all right here? -Yes.
Thank you. We're, we're just figuring out who gets the window seat.
translation.fr: Merci. On discute pour savoir qui aura le siège hublot.

translation.en: Seriously?
Yeah.
-Sure. We'll get you to Inuvik. -[George sighs]
Oh, my God, thank you. I'm Liv, by the way.
-Sam. -[Liv] Sam.
This is George, pilot ordinaire.
[in loud voice] Just souping her up. Sam likes to go fast.
translation.fr: Je le bichonne. Sam aime aller vite.

translation.en: Cool.
All good?
All good.
You're a nervous flier?
[in unamplified voice] I'm a nervous crasher.
-I said no, I'm a nervous crasher. -[chuckles]
translation.fr: J'ai dit non, j'ai juste peur de m'écraser.

translation.en: -[rattling] -Is this normal?
Late summer air, mixtures of hot and cold, makes for a rough ride.
translation.fr: La fin de l'été, l'alternance d'air chaud et froid, ça va secouer.

translation.en: [George] Hey. Hey, no cell phone. You'll mess with the instruments.
translation.fr: Pas de téléphone portable. Ça perturbe les instruments de bord.

translation.en: -Seriously? That's a real thing. -[Sam] Uh, it's fine.
translation.fr: - Sérieux ? Pour de vrai ? - C'est bon.

translation.en: George just doesn't trust anything without a rotary dial.
translation.fr: George ne fait confiance à rien sans cadran rotatif.

translation.en: Isn't there like smoother air higher up or something?
translation.fr: Il n'y a pas un air plus calme plus haut ?

translation.en: Do you have other thoughts? How's my tracking?
translation.fr: D'autres idées ? Mon cap vous convient ?

translation.en: -I'm sorry. I'm just-- -[Sam] Don't worry.
George knows what he's doing. [George] If I didn't, I wouldn't tell you.
translation.fr: - George sait ce qu'il fait. - Sinon, vous ne le sauriez pas.

translation.en: Hey, you want a drink?
Might help calm your nerves.
-No, I'm good. -[Sam] You sure?
You want a Power Bar, bottle of water?
Cocktail, New York Times?
translation.fr: Un cocktail, le New York Times ?

translation.en: -I'm not really a Power Bar person. -You ever been to Inuvik?
translation.fr: - Je n'aime pas les barres protéinées. - Vous connaissez Inuvik ?

translation.en: There's not gonna be much open by the time we land. Take them.
translation.fr: Il n'y aura rien d'ouvert à notre arrivée. Prenez-les.

translation.en: Thanks.
So, uh, what… takes you to the northwest territories?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qui vous amène dans les Territoires du Nord-Ouest ?

translation.en: I'm shooting the caribou run.
Uh, not shoot. "Shoot."
translation.fr: Je ne leur tire pas dessus, je les prends en photo.

translation.en: I'm a photographer for National Geographic.
translation.fr: Je suis photographe pour le National Geographic.

translation.en: Wow, your job's so much cooler than mine.
translation.fr: Votre boulot est plus cool que le mien.

translation.en: Well, I don't know about that. What kind of law do you practice?
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas. Quel genre de droit exercez-vous ?

translation.en: I'm a securities litigator.
You're right. My job is cooler.
translation.fr: Vous avez raison. Mon boulot est plus cool.

translation.en: Caribou run this late? I thought that was a spring thing.
translation.fr: Les caribous migrent si tard ? Je croyais que c'était au printemps.

translation.en: Hey, you got to go somewhere to come back, right?
translation.fr: Il faut bien aller quelque part pour revenir.

translation.en: I just go where they tell me.
translation.fr: Je vais là où on me dit d'aller.

translation.en: I'll be sitting in a camouflage tent with a thermos full of coffee
translation.fr: Je serai dans une tente de camouflage avec un thermos de café

translation.en: and about 8,000 cameras,
waiting for anything with antlers to run by.
translation.fr: à attendre que tout ce qui a des bois passe.

translation.en: That sounds nice.
It does, doesn't it?
And what about you?
What brings a securities litigator this far north?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qui amène une avocate dans le nord ?

translation.en: Um, just… boring lawyer stuff.
Uh, it seemed like more of an emergency back at the airport.
translation.fr: Des trucs d'avocats ennuyeux. Ça ressemblait plus à une urgence à l'aéroport.

translation.en: I'm gonna take a nap.
Uh, I'm sorry. I wasn't trying--
No, it's fine. it's just I'm-- I'm tired. Took me forever to get in from…
translation.fr: Non, ça va, mais je suis fatiguée. J'ai mis un temps fou à venir de…

translation.en: -I'm just… tired. -[Sam] All right.
We'll try to keep it down for you.
translation.fr: On va essayer de faire moins de bruit.

translation.en: [woman speaks in a calm voice] Close your eyes.
Ensure you're resting in a comfortable position.
translation.fr: Assurez-vous de vous reposer dans une position confortable.

translation.en: Inhale and exhale slowly,
in through the nose and out through the mouth.
translation.fr: inspirez par le nez et expirez par la bouche.

translation.en: Focus on tensing and relaxing each part of your body.
translation.fr: Contractez et détendez chaque partie de votre corps.

translation.en: Allow all thoughts to fall away.
You are only your body.
You are only your breath.
[Ruth] Hey, you made it.
-Hi. -[Liv] Hi. Of course, I made it.
translation.fr: - Salut. - Bien sûr que j'ai pu venir.

translation.en: You said you were having a crisis?
translation.fr: Tu as dit que tu avais une crise ?

translation.en: Yeah, the crisis was that you never come out to these things.
translation.fr: La crise, c'est que tu ne viens jamais pour ça.

translation.en: -Ruth, I have work to do. -[Ruth] No, Liv, no.
translation.fr: - Ruth, j'ai du travail. - Non, Liv. Non.

translation.en: -No. Come on. -[Ruth] We have all have work to do, but right now take this…
translation.fr: On a tous du travail, mais pour l'instant, prends ça…

translation.en: -[Liv] No. -…your work is beating Danny at darts.
translation.fr: - Non. - Ton travail bat Danny aux fléchettes.

translation.en: -[stammers] -[Ruth] We're down a player. Yes, yes.
translation.fr: Il nous manque un joueur. Allez.

translation.en: -Go. No, it's fine just go. It's great. -[Liv] Are you fucking…
translation.fr: - Vas-y. Non, c'est bon. Vas-y. - Putain, tu…

translation.en: -[Ruth chuckles] -Hey.
I think I just got tricked.
Why? You thought it was a shuffleboard tournament?
translation.fr: Pourquoi ? Tu croyais que c'était un tournoi de palets ?

translation.en: I can't stay long.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas rester longtemps.

translation.en: Okay. Am I ready for this?
I hear you're a shark. I've never played before.
translation.fr: - Il paraît que tu assures. - Je n'ai jamais joué.

translation.en: That's exactly what a shark would say.
Is Ruth trying to set us up?
Yeah, I think she is.
Is that appropriate?
-No, it isn't. -[Danny] Right.
That's what I… Okay.
Although, I guess, technically, we're not at work.
translation.fr: Même si, techniquement, on n'est pas au travail.

translation.en: Right. Bit of a gray area.
-Why are we flying so low? -[alarm blares]
-[alarm beeps] -No, shit I got nothing!
-Whoa, buddy! We're going down! -There's no pressure and fuel!
translation.fr: Mec ! On va s'écraser ! Je perds tout !

translation.en: George!
Put on your seatbelt.
Oh, my God.
[Sam] Help. Help! George. George, help me out.
translation.fr: Au secours. À l'aide ! George ! Aide-moi.

translation.en: -[Sam] Right here. -[Liv] Yeah.
[Liv] Are you okay? [gasping, pants] I can't swim. [heavy breathing] I can't swim.
translation.fr: - Ça va ? - Je ne sais pas nager.

translation.en: -Do you have, uh, life preservers? -[whimpers]
translation.fr: Il y a des gilets de sauvetage ?

translation.en: -Sam! Sam, do you have life preservers? -[George groaning]
translation.fr: Sam, tu as des gilets de sauvetage ?

translation.en: Flotation devices, something? -No. I don't know. I'll check. -[George grunting]
translation.fr: - Des bouées ? N'importe quoi ! - Non. Je ne sais pas. Je vais voir.

translation.en: My leg is stuck!
Guys, we got to get out of here! I mean, this thing's gonna sink!
translation.fr: Il faut qu'on sorte d'ici ! L'avion va couler !

translation.en: Sam, I'm gonna need your help. Sam?
What are you doing? Sam? No!
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que tu fais ? Sam ? Non !

translation.en: -No, just stop, that hurts! -I know it hurts,
translation.fr: - Arrête, ça fait mal ! - Je sais.

translation.en: -but we've gotta get you out of here. -Okay.
translation.fr: - Mais on doit te sortir d'ici. - D'accord.

translation.en: Hold your breath.
Please. Don't leave me.
translation.fr: S'il te plaît. Ne me laisse pas.

translation.en: [Sam] Liv!
Help!
Kick your legs!
-Just kick your legs! -[Sam] Help!
-Help me! -Use your legs, Sam.
-It's okay, Sam. -Please, help me.
translation.fr: - Ça va aller, Sam. - S'il te plaît, aide-moi.

translation.en: -Help me! -Hey!
[Sam] Help me!
Sam, look at me! Stop!
I need you to stop or we'll both drown, okay?
translation.fr: Arrête ou on va se noyer tous les deux.

translation.en: -[pants] -Stop, look I got you.
Kick your legs, -I'll take us both in, okay? -Uh-huh.
translation.fr: Lève les jambes, je nous ramène sur le rivage.

translation.en: -You got me? -I got you.
translation.fr: - Tu me tiens ? - Je te tiens.

translation.en: [Liv in a weak voice] Oh, Sam.
We made it.
We're good.
Sam?
Sam?
Hey. Hey, Sam, wake up.
Oh, shit.
-Sorry, no, I'm sorry. I'm sorry. -No!
You just have this metal thing in your leg,
translation.fr: Tu as un truc en métal dans la jambe.

translation.en: -I'm trying to take it out. -No! No, no, no, no, no, I'll bleed out.
translation.fr: - J'essaie de l'enlever. - Non ! Je vais me vider de mon sang.

translation.en: It's pretty bad.
A tourniquet.
You have to make a tourniquet.
-[Sam] My belt, use my belt. -Yeah.
Okay. It's okay. I got it. I got it.
Wrap it round.
-[groans, grunts] -I'm sorry. I'm so sorry.
[Liv] I can't get it tight enough.
translation.fr: Je n'arrive pas à serrer assez.

translation.en: Sam, how do I make it tighter?
translation.fr: Sam, comment je fais pour le serrer ?

translation.en: Okay, I think I got it.
Oh, thank God it stopped.
Shit, how do I keep this tight?
translation.fr: Merde, comment je fais tenir ça ?

translation.en: Fuck!
Stay with me, Sam. Please.
translation.fr: Reste avec moi, Sam. S'il te plaît.

translation.en: It stopped.
Sam… Sam, it stopped.
Shit.
I'm sorry, Sam.
Sam… [pants] I'm not leaving.
I'm just gonna go try and get higher to see if I can get service, okay?
translation.fr: Je vais monter pour voir s'il y a du réseau.

translation.en: I'll be right back.
[whispers] It's okay, it's gonna be okay.
One bar. Just one bar. Stupid trees.
translation.fr: Une barre. Juste une barre. Putains d'arbres.

translation.en: [in normal voice] Really? Fuck.
[screams] Fuck!
Hello?
Help!
Is anybody out there?
Come on.
Are you kidding me?
Come… [sighs]
[in a strained voice] Come on, are you fucking kidding me?
translation.fr: Putain, tu te fous de moi ?

translation.en: Okay. Well, I didn't see you helping.
translation.fr: Bon. Je ne t'ai pas vu aider.

translation.en: We'll figure out something better tomorrow.
Night, Sam.
-Hey, it's Liv. -[grunts]
-Oh, it hurts. -I know, don't try to move. It's your leg.
translation.fr: - Ça fait trop mal. - Je sais, ne bouge pas. C'est ta jambe.

translation.en: No, my stomach. [groans] It fucking hurts.
translation.fr: Non, mon ventre. Putain, ça me lance.

translation.en: -Make it stop. -Okay. Wait, hold on. Let me see.
translation.fr: - Fais que ça s'arrête. - D'accord. Attends. Laisse-moi voir.

translation.en: Oh, God. Shit.
Where's the plane?
It's… it's gone.
We crashed.
-What? Where? -[Liv] I don't know.
translation.fr: - Quoi ? Où ? - Je ne sais pas.

translation.en: Where's George?
We're-- we're just gonna have to wait for them to find us.
translation.fr: On va devoir attendre qu'ils nous trouvent.

translation.en: We're gonna sit tight and we're gonna, we're gonna stay right here--
translation.fr: On va attendre et on va rester ici…

translation.en: No, they're not coming.
Of course, they are.
George logged a flight plan.
translation.fr: George a déclaré un plan de vol.

translation.en: When you don't show up, your company's gonna send--
translation.fr: En ne te voyant pas, ta boîte enverra…

translation.en: No, they're not.
Where are the bags?
-Where-- where are the bags? -Sam, National Geographic's not just…
translation.fr: - Où sont les sacs ? - Sam, National Geographic n'est pas…

translation.en: When you don't show up, they're gonna send someone.
translation.fr: Sans nouvelles de toi, ils enverront quelqu'un.

translation.en: I'm not a photographer.
No one's coming. No one knows we're here.
translation.fr: Personne ne viendra. Personne ne sait qu'on est là.

translation.en: You're on your own.
